buffer_duration.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The duration of the internal ring buffer. Larger values may reduce stuttering but use more memory. Defaults to `500ms`.

*See also: [Resampler Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/resampler.html#configuration-variables)*

filters.docs:
**, positive integer**: The number of windowed sinc interpolation filters to use. Must be between `2` and `1024`. Defaults to `16`.

*See also: [Resampler Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/resampler.html#configuration-variables)*

output_speaker.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The [speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/index.html) to output the resampled audio.

*See also: [Resampler Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/resampler.html#configuration-variables)*

taps.docs:
**, positive integer**: The number of taps per windowed sinc interpolation filter. Must between `16` and `128` and divisible by 4. Defaults to `16`.

*See also: [Resampler Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/resampler.html#configuration-variables)*

task_stack_in_psram.docs:
**, boolean**: Only with `esp-idf`. Run the audio tasks in external memory. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Resampler Speaker](https://esphome.io/components/speaker/resampler.html#configuration-variables)*
